title: Decentralize your sequencer -- A guide for L2’s
description:
This talk will act as a river guide exploring the design space for L2 sequencer decentralization. It will cover:

1. Should L2’s care about decentralizing a sequencer?
2. What does it mean for UX?
3. Forced Inclusion ≠ Decentralised sequencing
4. ELI5 the approaches being taken by L2's
5. Based rollups to the rescue?
6. What are for optimistic / zk and / privacy rollups
7. L2 Consensus networks are not the solution
8. Decentralisation is not just about sequencing rights
